```{r}
ARM_df <- read.transactions("C:/Users/ryhen/OneDrive - UCB-O365/Machine Learning/Project/Part 2/ARM/ARM_Pokemon.csv", rm.duplicates = FALSE, format = "basket", sep=",")

inspect(ARM_df[1:5])
```

```{r}
apriori_ARM <- arules::apriori(ARM_df, parameter = list(support = .05, confidence = .95, minlen=2))
inspect(apriori_ARM)
```

```{r}
Pokemon_Rules <- apriori(data=ARM_df,parameter = list(supp=.025, conf=.025, minlen=5),
                     appearance = list(default="lhs", rhs="incineroar"),
                     control=list(verbose=FALSE))
Pokemon_Rules <- sort(Pokemon_Rules, decreasing=TRUE, by='confidence')
inspect(Pokemon_Rules)
```


```{r}
arules::itemFrequencyPlot(ARM_df, topN = 20,
                          main = 'Relative Item Frequency Plot',
                          type = "relative", #absolute
                          ylab = "Item Frequency (Relative)")
```

```{r}
SortedRules<- sort(Pokemon_Rules, by="confidence", decreasing=TRUE)
inspect(SortedRules[1:10])
```

